game.name: Chop Chop Together
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 앱 내 구매, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A chaotic 1-4 player co-op profession sim where housemates team up to earn cash, complete hilarious jobs, and survive the wildest workdays ever!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A chaotic 1-4 player co-op profession sim where housemates team up to earn cash, complete hilarious jobs, and survive the wildest workdays ever!
